> Quickstride nodds his head in compliance to Lord Elder and rears up on hi=
s hind hooves.
>
> "Yes Sir! QUICKSTRIDE, MAXIMIZE!"
>
> Within moments he =
transforms into his robot mode and runs off in the directon of the shuttle.=
 Even on two feet he proves swift and wastes no time in getting to his dest=
ination.

Elder sighed as Quickstride moved off to ready the shuttle. There=
 was
a time many years ago when he was much like this younger Maximal, but
=
time has worn on him.

He had just began to bring the Ark's defense systems=
 online when Rat
Trap reestablished his connection to him.

> "Sorry, ran i=
nta interference, I'm back online Lord Elder. I'm about a quarter of the wa=
y through the base's pipe system. But those uglies ain't givn' up on me. I =
gotta do somethn' ta distract 'em... Now let's see.... If I was these guys =
what would I be worried about? Hmmm, well, defenses for the most part, and =
then any circuitry related ta power, computer systems.... That's it. I bet =
if I can find a few electrical ports I might be able ta pull some plugs her=
e 'n there.."

"Yes Rat Trap!" Elder said as he watched his own defense sys=
tems come
online under his hands, "If you could bring down even some of the=
ir
defense systems, it would give us a chance!"

Lord Elder smiled as he wa=
tched first one, and then two, and finally
all five lights went from red to=
 yellow and then green - the system
was online. The room began to hum as sy=
stems fed and rerouted power
through the ship. It couldn't hold off a full =
scale minion attack, but
perhaps it would give them time to get back here i=
f something went
wrong.

Lord Elder opened his channel to Rat Trap, "We are=
 about to leave, do
what you can." With a last glance at the controls he qu=
ickly left the
room, making his own way swiftly towards the shuttle bay.

*=
*********************

As Quickstride made his way towards the shuttle, he =
entered the large
entrance/exit chamber of the Ark. To the fore was a large=
 door way
that led into the outside world, although the doors leading out w=
ere
currently closed.

All about the room there were larger ancient transfo=
rmers, strewn
about as if cast there by some storm, or perhaps some massive=
 crash!
Optimus Prime and Megatron could be seen, looking to be locked in
b=
attle even in their offline state. A quick glance around would reveal
vario=
us other Autobots and Decepticons laying around, all in a similar
offline c=
ondition.

In fact the entire room looked to be battle damaged, computer sc=
reens
smashed, consoles split, burnt and ruined. Even the walls look to be
=
bent and cracked in places, wires hung from holes in the ceiling.

However =
in the middle of all this cacophony a standard Maximal shuttle
is positione=
d, standing in a small relatively clear space in the room.

As Quickstride =
entered the room a hum could be heard as the Ark's
outer defense shields sp=
rang into place.

OOC: Figured I would give Quickstride some description of=
 the room! :)

(TAG)

Preston
(Lord Elder)
